sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Russia's inability to regenerate expanded mechanized vehicles in the short term further restricts Russian maneuver warfare capabilities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The International Institute for Strategic Studies reported that Russia lost about 50% of its T-72B and T-72B3M tanks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: its T-72B and T-72B3M tanks. The timely Western provisions of tanks and armored vehicles to Ukraine would further offset Russia's ability to conduct mechanized warfare as Russia struggles to restart its defense production in the immediate term. Ukraine likely continues to have a window of opportunity to initiate large-scale counter-offensives over the next few months, but its ability to do so likely rests heavily on the speed and scale at which the West provides it with necessary material, particularly tanks and armoured vehicles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Now, the UK Defence Ministry adds that across Russia, the airspace forces likely maintain a largely intact fleet of approximately 1,500 five hundred crude military aircraft despite losing over a hundred and thirty since the start of the invasion it is unlikely that the airspace forces are currently preparing for a dramatically expanded air campaign as under the current battlefield circumstances it would likely suffer unsustainable aircraft losses overall Russian air power continues to significantly underperform in the war constrained by a continued high threat from Ukrainian air defenses and dispersed basing due to the threat of strikes against Russian airfields Russian combat jets operate almost exclusively over Russian held territory preventing them from carrying out their key strike role effectively.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Sie ist an der Grenze zwischen der Türkei und Syrien. border crossings, the Syrian regime agreed to open so that aid can enter Syria and reach some of the areas affected by those quakes last week. And as you can see, trucks are not the only thing going in. Over there, there are dozens of Syrian families waiting for a chance to go back to their home country. Some have been saying they have been here in Turkey for several years, but that their homes here also got destroyed in this tragedy. Many say their priority right now is to go back and try to reach loved ones who may be wounded, who may have been lost in this disaster, and see if anything from their previous lives is still standing.
